head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths REILLEY, ELIZABETH KALS

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths REILLEY, ELIZABETH KALS

block.p: REILLEY--Elizabeth Kals, of Muttontown, LI on March 29th, 2007 in her 100th year. Beloved wife of the late Ewing. Aunt of Maria Kals Opie and Karen Kals Ezekiel. Great-aunt of Jane Opie Maltan and Andreas Maltan. Also survived by special caregivers Jesus and Amparo Martinez. Friends may visit at the Funeral Home of Dodge-Thomas, Glen Cove, LI on Sunday 4-6pm. Interment private at St. John's of Lattingtown Memorial Garden. A memorial service will be held in her garden in May.
